content.raw:
> The Animation class doesn’t seem to follow PIMPL, for this reason I believe this PR is ABI breaking, is this intended?

We probably just didn't have time to do it. It would be good to do it eventually.

> I didn’t add the interpolate_x constructor parameter to NumericAnimation

I think that should be fine, I believe that class is not meant to be used in a way where "X" makes sense.
content.html:
The Animation class doesn’t seem to follow PIMPL, for this reason I believe this PR is ABI breaking, is this intended?

We probably just didn't have time to do it. It would be good to do it eventually.

I didn’t add the interpolate_x constructor parameter to NumericAnimation

I think that should be fine, I believe that class is not meant to be used in a way where "X" makes sense.
